title: Who Really Shines in the Goop Glow?
author: Ellen Gamerman
description: Gwyneth Paltrow's wellness brand debuts new series as practitioners bask in the limelight
cleaned_text: Jan. 22, 2020 11:24 am ET In the new Netflix show "The Goop Lab with Gwyneth Paltrow," energy practitioner John Amaral hovers his hands a few inches over stressed-out clients in what looks like a spa version of an exorcism. After their bodies twist and twitch in response, they report feeling better. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
